mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Emp( cd_emp, nm_krname, yn_for, no_social, job_ok, da_enter, fg_sex, abb_nation, yn_resident, str_39_1_1, str_40_1_1, cd_nation, zip_home, add_home1, add_home2, tel_home1, tel_home2, tel_home3, cel_emp1, cel_emp2, cel_emp3, em_emp, id_msn, cd_dept, cd_occup, rank_no, cd_salcls, cd_field, cd_project, da_retire, cd_bank, no_bnkacct, nm_bnkowner, mn_6_1_1, cd_acctit1, cd_acctit2, fg_paysupply, mn_mmaverage, mn_natptarget, mn_natpslev, mn_hostarget, mn_hos, no_health, mn_emptarget, mn_emp, yn_employ, yn_ceo, yn_sanjae, yn_longinsur, str_32_1_1, str_33_1_1, str_35_1_1, mn_2_1_1, mn_3_1_1, str_1_1_1, str_45_1_1, str_46_1_1, str_47_1_1, mn_1_1_1, yn_danil, yn_iclman, str_43_1_1, str_44_1_1, mn_iclpay, str_34_1_1, yn_forlabor, yn_unit, yn_overwork, str_42_1_1, mn_4_1_1 ) VALUES ( #{cdEmp}, #{nmKrname}, #{ynFor}, #{noSocial}, #{jobOk}, #{daEnter}, #{fgSex}, #{abbNation}, #{ynResident}, #{str3911}, #{str4011}, #{cdNation}, #{zipHome}, #{addHome1}, #{addHome2}, #{telHome1}, #{telHome2}, #{telHome3}, #{celEmp1}, #{celEmp2}, #{celEmp3}, #{emEmp}, #{idMsn}, #{cdDept}, #{cdOccup}, #{rankNo}, #{cdSalcls}, #{cdField}, #{cdProject}, #{daRetire}, #{cdBank}, #{noBnkacct}, #{nmBnkowner}, #{mn611}, #{cdAcctit1}, #{cdAcctit2}, #{fgPaysupply}, #{mnMmaverage}, #{mnNatptarget}, #{mnNatpslev}, #{mnHostarget}, #{mnHos}, #{noHealth}, #{mnEmptarget}, #{mnEmp}, #{ynEmploy}, #{ynCeo}, #{ynSanjae}, #{ynLonginsur}, #{str3211}, #{str3311}, #{str3511}, #{mn2111}, #{mn3111}, #{str1111}, #{str4511}, #{str4611}, #{str4711}, #{mn1111}, #{ynDanil}, #{ynIclman}, #{str4311}, #{str4411}, #{mnIclpay}, #{str3411}, #{ynForlabor}, #{ynUnit}, #{ynOverwork}, #{str4211}, #{mn4111} )
mapper.update: UPDATE Emp SET nm_krname = #{nmKrname}, yn_for = #{ynFor}, no_social = #{noSocial}, job_ok = #{jobOk}, da_enter = #{daEnter}, fg_sex = #{fgSex}, abb_nation = #{abbNation}, yn_resident = #{ynResident}, str_39_1_1 = #{str3911}, str_40_1_1 = #{str4011}, cd_nation = #{cdNation}, zip_home = #{zipHome}, add_home1 = #{addHome1}, add_home2 = #{addHome2}, tel_home1 = #{telHome1}, tel_home2 = #{telHome2}, tel_home3 = #{telHome3}, cel_emp1 = #{celEmp1}, cel_emp2 = #{celEmp2}, cel_emp3 = #{celEmp3}, em_emp = #{emEmp}, id_msn = #{idMsn}, cd_dept = #{cdDept}, cd_occup = #{cdOccup}, rank_no = #{rankNo}, cd_salcls = #{cdSalcls}, cd_field = #{cdField}, cd_project = #{cdProject}, da_retire = #{daRetire}, cd_bank = #{cdBank}, no_bnkacct = #{noBnkacct}, nm_bnkowner = #{nmBnkowner}, mn_6_1_1 = #{mn611}, cd_acctit1 = #{cdAcctit1}, cd_acctit2 = #{cdAcctit2}, fg_paysupply = #{fgPaysupply}, mn_mmaverage = #{mnMmaverage}, mn_natptarget = #{mnNatptarget}, mn_natpslev = #{mnNatpslev}, mn_hostarget = #{mnHostarget}, mn_hos = #{mnHos}, no_health = #{noHealth}, mn_emptarget = #{mnEmptarget}, mn_emp = #{mnEmp}, yn_employ = #{ynEmploy}, yn_ceo = #{ynCeo}, yn_sanjae = #{ynSanjae}, yn_longinsur = #{ynLonginsur}, str_32_1_1 = #{str3211}, str_33_1_1 = #{str3311}, str_35_1_1 = #{str3511}, mn_2_1_1 = #{mn2111}, mn_3_1_1 = #{mn3111}, str_1_1_1 = #{str1111}, str_45_1_1 = #{str4511}, str_46_1_1 = #{str4611}, str_47_1_1 = #{str4711}, mn_1_1_1 = #{mn1111}, yn_danil = #{ynDanil}, yn_iclman = #{ynIclman}, str_43_1_1 = #{str4311}, str_44_1_1 = #{str4411}, mn_iclpay = #{mnIclpay}, str_34_1_1 = #{str3411}, yn_forlabor = #{ynForlabor}, yn_unit = #{ynUnit}, yn_overwork = #{ynOverwork}, str_42_1_1 = #{str4211}, mn_4_1_1 = #{mn4111} WHERE cd_emp = #{cdEmp}
